name: Bonnie's Pizza
description:
How To Install

Install the game open the files and click on Fnaf Maker then press extract all (if your computer asks you to) make sure the folder "Bonnie's Pizza" Is With It. Once Inside Click Play (Unless you would like to make an edited version of mine) and press Bonnie's Pizza.

Bonnie's Pizza Description

After The Shutdown Of Freddy Fazbear's Pizza It Was Rebranded As Bonnie's Pizza (Former Side Character) No Other Animatronics Are Planned.

You Are The Night Guard Here Survive Until 6AM And You Win
